params.createDAOParams: The struct of parameters used for creating the DAO and Access Control contracts
params.daoFactory: The address of the DAO factory
params.metaFactoryTempRoleIndex: The index of which role specified in createDAOParams should be temporarily given to the MetaFactory
params.moduleActionData: Struct of functionDescs and roles to setup for each newly created module
params.moduleFactoriesCallData: The calldata required for each module factory call
params.roleModuleMembers: Array of which newly created modules should be given each role

returns._0: Array of addresses of the newly created modules

params.interfaceId: An interface ID bytes4 as defined by ERC-165

returns._0: bool Indicates whether the interface is supported

createDAOAndModules(address,uint256,(add.notice: Creates a DAO, Access Control, and any modules specified

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: Returns whether a given interface ID is supported

userdoc.notice: A factory contract for deploying DAOs along with any desired modules within one transaction
